conceptual definition: Indices (h k l) describing crystal plane orientation
numerical values (if applicable): (h k l) ∈ ℤ (where ℤ is a set of all integers )
remarks/purpose: Description or identification of crystallographic planes within a crystal lattice

numerical values (if applicable): different constraints may be imposed on the indices depending upon whether the crystal structure
remarks/purpose: predict material properties and behavior guided by crystal orientation

conceptual definition: a set of parameters that describe the size and shape of a crystal lattice
numerical values (if applicable): a b and c in the unit of Å ; α β and  γ in unit of degrees(°)

conceptual definition: the change in the lattice parameters (lengths and angles of the unit cell) before and after the transformation

numerical values (if applicable): A_ij and A'_ij respectively represent the components of the lattice parameters matrix before and after the transformation
